txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Thorin's Gate following the defeat of the Dourhands, speak with Gandalf.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the tutorial is complete.</rgb>

If you choose to skip the introductory tutorial experience, you will be transported to Thorin's Gate after the defeat of the Dourhands and will be unable to travel to Thorin's Gate prior to those events.

Are you sure you want to continue?

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the tutorial is complete.</rgb>
Talk to Gandalf to skip the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Thorin's Gate following the defeat the Dourhands, speak with Gandalf.
<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the tutorial is complete</rgb>
